term.title: E/Z photoisomerization

item.text: General designation of a photoinduced geometrical isomerization of a C–C double bond.

notes.item: Geometrical isomerization of a C–C double bond is called a cis/trans isomerization in 1,2-disubstituted alkenes.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 293. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry, 3rd edition (IUPAC Recommendations 2006)' on page 338 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779030293)
